trans-unit.source: Defines methods that decrypt an XrML <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Definisce i metodi che decrittografano un elemento <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> XrML.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor> interface with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> class to decrypt an XrML `<encryptedGrant>` element.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor> interfacciarsi con il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> classe per decrittografare un XrML `<encryptedGrant>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to validate an XML digital signature using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor> interface and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come convalidare una firma digitale XML mediante il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor> interfaccia e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> classe.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> object that encapsulates the algorithm used for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> che incapsula l'algoritmo utilizzato per la crittografia XML.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> object that contains an asymmetric key to use for decryption.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> che contiene una chiave asimmetrica da utilizzare per la decrittografia.

trans-unit.source: A stream object that contains an <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> element to decrypt.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto flusso che contiene un elemento <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> da decrittografare.

trans-unit.source: Decrypts an XrML <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> element that is contained within a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Decrittografa un elemento <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> XrML contenuto all'interno di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object that contains a decrypted <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> che contiene un elemento <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> decrittografato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor.Decrypt%2A> method decrypts an XrML `<encryptedGrant>` element and returns a plaintext stream.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor.Decrypt%2A> metodo consente di decrittografare un XrML `<encryptedGrant>` elemento e restituisce un flusso di testo normale.
